text: is a Japanese politician and former police officer. He was the Minister of Justice for a short time in 2022. He is a member of the Liberal Democratic Party (LDP). He has been in the House of Representatives since 2003. Hanashi was born in Ibaraki Prefecture, Japan. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:People from Ibaraki Prefecture Category:Ministers of justice of Japan
title: Yasuhiro Hanashi
